alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Ft; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 7:14PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Baca, southeastern Las Animas and southeastern Bent Counties through 800 PM MDT... At 713 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles east of Higbee to 14 miles northwest of Kim to near Segundo. Movement was southeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Springfield, Pritchett, Branson, Kim, Starkville, Raton Pass and Trinchera. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
